scripts.docker: export NAME="exposed_http_server" && docker build . -t $NAME && docker run --restart=always -p 3000:3000 -v $(pwd)/mnt:/usr/src/app/mnt -d $NAME
scripts.sudo_docker: export NAME="exposed_http_server" && sudo docker build -t $NAME . && sudo docker run --restart=always -p 3000:3000 -v $(pwd)/mnt:/usr/src/app/mnt -d $NAME
scripts.docker_setup: mkdir config; mkdir config/key; cd config/key && openssl req -nodes -new -x509 -keyout server.key -out server.cert
